column4: is there anyway to upgrade to gutsy gibbon when im booted using feisty?
add the gutsy repos and do apt-get dist-upgrade I believe
ok thanks, will look up the repos!
you can even mount the gutsy CD ISO (or stick the cd into your drive) and just dist-upgrade, no need to add repos :)
sorry, I do not :( I just use the ISO (14MBps connection).
